message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/DevGalway2011 

The extension of the Internet into the physical world (Internet of
Things) requires the integration of Web, database, distributed
systems, and networking research along with light-weight semantics and
linked open data as the new general-purpose data-integration
layer. Topics of interest (non-exlusive) are linked data and semantics
for the IoT, scalable query processing, cross-layer approaches
(network, middleware, database, Linked Open Data), mobile applications
(Android),
etc.
We are looking for a senior developer and software engineer to manage
and coordinate the implementation of our research prototypes. This
role includes:
- Software project managament
- Architectural design and integration of our various systems
- Development in mobile platforms
- Definition of development infrastructures (code repositories, etc.) supported by our excellent technical staff
- Lead implementation and coding
The position is full-time. Salary is competitive and depends on
qualifications and experience.
The Digital Enterprise Research Institute, Galway (DERI,
http://www.deri.ie/
) is a world-wide leading research organization
which actively advances research in this new domain. DERI offers a
stimulating, dynamic, multi-cultural research environment with
excellent ties to research groups and industry worldwide. The
institute is locate in Galway which is one of the most beautiful Irish
cities shaped by artistic communities, active student life, innovative
industry and leading edge research. Galway is located at the beautiful
west coast of Ireland within the Galway Bay, 'between' Europe and the
U.S., making it an ideal hub for national, European and international
research.
Applications should be sent to manfred.hauswirth@deri.org.
speaker: SYSTEM
